display_long_description:
🛠️ Escape a Steampunk Prison in VR

Set in a war-torn steampunk world, you play as a scientist captured while operating near an enemy base. Now imprisoned inside a massive fortress isolated in the middle of the sea, survival is only the beginning — escape is the real challenge.

Starting in a dark prison cell, you must rely on your intelligence and observation skills to overcome a series of ingenious environmental puzzles. Each new area brings fresh dangers and mysteries, including:

🍽️ The Cafeteria, where routine hides secrets

🛏️ The Dormitory, filled with clues left behind

🏭 The Command Block, heavily guarded and complex

🌊 An Underwater Chamber, where tension and mystery reach their peak

Designed from the ground up for virtual reality, every interaction is hands-on, immersive, and deliberate.

🚀 Your Objective

Solve the puzzles, navigate the prison, and reach the airship — your only chance to leave the fortress behind and finally claim your long-awaited freedom.
